minestra.file

Class PathIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • minestra.file.PathIterator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Path>, Iterator<Path>

    public final class PathIterator
extends Object
implements Iterator<Path>, Iterable<Path>
    PathIterator privides a find-like feature.

    This feature is similar to Files.find(java.nio.file.Path, int, java.util.function.BiPredicate<java.nio.file.Path, java.nio.file.attribute.BasicFileAttributes>, java.nio.file.FileVisitOption...). However, Files.find encounts IOException and stop finding.

    PathIterator keep finding with printing the warning by default, when it encounts IOException.
